title: Cast It On
content: A child asks a question that destabilizes the room. The cost of clarity arrives instantly, reshaping her sense of reality.

title: System Recognition Event
content: An adult realizes the child sees the architecture of their authority. Fear masquerades as discipline. A new timeline forms.

title: Birth of the Architect
content: The child learns a lifelong truth: accuracy is dangerous. The punishment was never for misbehavior â€” it was for perception. A destiny begins.

title: The Cost of Seeing
description: The parallel scenes where perception becomes threat, threat becomes punishment, and punishment becomes identity.
